name: file-manager
description: Manage your file the way you like. You can upload, delete, copy, move, rename, compress, extract files. You don't need to worry about ftp. It is really simple and easy to use.
author: Bit Apps

scripts.sass:build: npm run sass:compile && npm run sass:minify
scripts.sass:watch: npm run sass:build && onchange 'sass/**/*.sass' -- npm run sass:build
scripts.elfinder:watch: npm run build:elfinder && onchange 'submodule/sources/elFinder/**/*' -- npm run build:elfinder
scripts.build:prod: npm run build:elfinder && npm run sass:build  && npm run build:theme && npm run build:copy && npm run build:zip
scripts.production: composer i --no-dev && pnpm i && npm run i18n:php && npm run sass:build
